'''1.8.2-pre4''' is the fourth pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.8.2]], released on January 16, 2015.<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20150120132547/https://mojang.com/2014/12/minecraft-1-8-2-pre1-christmas-gift-edition/|title=Minecraft 1.8.2-pre4 – Updated Christmas Gift Edition|website=Mojang.com|author=[[Searge]]}}</ref>

== Changes ==
=== World generation ===
'''[[Dark oak tree]]s and [[oak tree]]s'''
* Oak and dark oak branches no longer replace blocks.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.8.2-pre4|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|10176|Oak/dark oak tree branches can replace all solid blocks (including bedrock and barrier).
|51804|Corner fences/cobblestone wall with a block next to them turn black (Smooth lighting off).
|71163|Bed can overlap when placed on grass.
|;previous
|76562|Hoppers do not work.
}}</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* This version was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
